data.title: VERSA CARDIO
data.meta_description:
VERSA CARDIO | 65 followers on LinkedIn. ECG Telemetry ambulatory monitoring solution and IDTF ECG diagnostic Lab Services | VERSA CARDIO, is an IDTF Services Lab focusing on ECG telemetry and technology development firm. 

Our new developed V-Patch Solution received FDA 510k Approval in 2022. Industry leading ECG Telemetry technology for the I.D.T.F industry.
data.text:
Versa Cardio is excited to announce its participation at Heart Rhythm 2024, located at booth 1363, from Thursday, May 16 to Sunday, May 19, 2024, at the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center in Boston, MA. As pioneers in the development of modern web-based scaling telemetry software and hardware, we take pride in our IDTF ECG Telemetry Lab Services, trusted by thousands of Physicians Nationwide. Visit our booth to experience our comprehensive IDTF ECG Telemetry Operation Software suite and discover the innovative Micro-Size V-Patch monitor, both showcased for your exploration. At the core of our system lies the IDTF operational/diagnostic BPM solution, boasting a user-friendly "mass central ECG data pooling" UI tailored for efficient bulk ECG data editing and diagnostics. Our solution provides a guided, step-by-step monitoring process, automated tasks, event notifications, tech/physician notation capabilities, and much more, ensuring seamless operation and enhanced diagnostic efficiency.

Focusing on ECG telemetry diagnostics, That's all we do! Empowering Health Through ECG Innovation. Experience next-gen diagnostics with our micro-sized Wireless ECG Monitoring Solution. Our revolutionary V-Patch Solution, replaces traditional wired diagnostics technology. With the smallest and lightest ECG patch available, we offer cellular ECG telemetry diagnostics with near real-time insight. Elevate your patient care with event notifications and reporting as the patient is monitored, all in a micro sized ECG Patch. Explore the simplicity of integrating ECG Telemetry into your healthcare practice, effortlessly introducing a lucrative revenue stream with no upfront or investment required. Versa Cardio has an impressive competitive IP portfolio, including the user-friendly V-Patch Solution and a custom-built BPM system, which has facilitated rapid market penetration due to its simplistic and intuitive approach. Our competitors solutions utilize older web-based technologies and non web-based solutions that remain unchanged, we never stop modernizing. Our competitive edge as a developer never stops, our teams of developers improve non-stop. Our UI's, UX, report presentations and processes are vastly superior to our competitors. Versa Cardio's rapid advancement in ECG telemetry monitoring has positioned us as the sixth largest MCT Medicare IDTF by volume and revenues in the USA. The V-Patch sensor, notable for its size, weight, and ease of use, has simplified the process from start to finish. The fundamental component of our system is the IDTF operational/diagnostic/BPM solution, featuring "mass central ECG data pooling" UI designed for efficient editing bulk ECG data and diagnostics. This novel streamlined interface benefits both ECG technicians and physicians, providing a more efficient approach to ambulatory ECG patient diagnostics.
